A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
As I was leaving the cinema I felt nothing but disappointment and confusion.

What's the point? What was the point of Snoke? Or Phasma? Of all the mystery behind the First Jedi? Why some characters say and do such a stupid things?

Nothing makes sense with this movie. It feels like it was redone just to suit Disney's agenda. I refuse to believe that any movie director could screw this up so badly on his own (yeah\, even Lucas).
